definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: They have made many trips traveling both north and south on the eastern intercoastal waterway.
sentences.chinese: 他们在东海岸内陆航道上有过反复多次的南北航行。

sentences.english: And ships can reach the Atlantic Ocean from the Great Lakes through the Saint Lawrence Seaway.
sentences.chinese: 而船只则能够从五大湖经过圣劳伦斯航道到达大西洋。

sentences.english: Your present course too close to port limit of fairway.
sentences.chinese: 你船现在的航向离航道的右边界太近。

sentences.english: Your present course too close to starboard limit of fairway.
sentences.chinese: 你船现在的航向离航道的右边界太近。

sentences.english: They laid the sails aback so as to stay on course in the storm wind.
sentences.chinese: 他们使帆成为逆风向以便在暴风中保持既定航道。

sentences.english: Based on the experience of Wujiang River waterway regulation, Wujiang River waterway rapids are classified.
sentences.chinese: 根据乌江航道整治经验，对乌江航道滩险进行分类。

sentences.english: Based on the experience of Wujiang River waterway regulation, Wujiang River waterway rapids are classified.
sentences.chinese: 根据乌江航道整治经验，对乌江航道滩险进行分类。

sentences.english: The ship sheered off at the last minute .
sentences.chinese: 船在最后一分钟偏离航道。

sentences.english: You must stay clear of fairway.
sentences.chinese: 你船必须远离航道停泊。

sentences.english: That summer was the glide path of our love.
sentences.chinese: 那个夏天是我们爱情的下滑航道。

sentences.english: The channel is marked by buoys.
The riverbed of the North Channel is unstable and changing.
sentences.chinese: 北港河床航道稳定性较差，河床逐渐演变。

sentences.english: You are approaching reference line of fairway.
sentences.chinese: 你船正接近航道的参照线。

sentences.english: Does China regard the northwest passage as internal waters of Canada or international waterway?
sentences.chinese: 中方认为西北航道属于加拿大内水还是国际航道？
